summary: This mod adds an item that able to hide the tail of argonian and khazzit
descriptionHtml:
This mod adds an item that able to hide the tail of Argonian and Khajiits 

you can make a Tail Binder at forge(misc) with 2 leather strings

 you can wear a Tail Binder with every items (does not share a equip slot )  

it does not change your game to the strange language version, the reason you can see the Korean latter in my picture is because I\'m personally using Korean string files, so don\'t worry about it.

-Installing-

1. Extract ESP to your Skyrim folder 

2. Check the esp file (Hide_Tail_Binder) in the DATA section of your Skyrim Launcher
author: Ryeong
